content: this legal text summarizes a case that took place over a period of four years it involves a mortgage contract for the purchase of a family home which has already been fully repaid the court made decisions regarding the allocation of the family home custody of the minor child and maintenance payments the court declared a legal separation between two parties and ordered the necessary procedures to be fulfilled the court dismissed claims for damages and entrusted the parents with parental responsibility of their minor daughter the court granted the applicant the use of the family home and ordered the defendant to pay a monthly allowance for the maintenance of the minor daughter the court also ordered that extraordinary expenses related to the minor daughter be shared equally between the parties the court declared the claims brought by the defendant as inadmissible and ordered the respondent to reimburse the appellant for the costs of the proceedings the judgment is considered final and enforceable
